00014 #include <QGridLayout>

00017 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00018 // Function: KactusAttributeEditor()
00019 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00020 KactusAttributeEditor::KactusAttributeEditor(QWidget* parent) : QGroupBox(tr("Kactus Attributes"), parent),
00021                                                                 prodHierLabel_(0), prodHierCombo_(0),
00022                                                                 firmnessLabel_(0), firmnessCombo_(0),
00023                                                                 implementationLabel_(0), implementationValue_(0)
00024 {
00025     // Create the product hierarchy label and combo box.
00026     prodHierLabel_ = new QLabel(tr("Product Hierarchy:"), this);
00027     //prodHierLabel_->setVisible(false);
00028 
00029     prodHierCombo_ = new QComboBox(this);
00030     //prodHierCombo_->setVisible(false);
00031     
00032     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < PROD_HIER_COUNT; ++i)
00033     {
00034         KactusAttribute::ProductHierarchy val = static_cast<KactusAttribute::ProductHierarchy>(i);
00035         prodHierCombo_->addItem(KactusAttribute::valueToString(val));
00036     }
00037 
00038     // Create the firmness label and combo box.
00039     firmnessLabel_ = new QLabel(tr("Firmness:"));
00040     firmnessCombo_ = new QComboBox(this);
00041 
00042     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < FIRMNESS_COUNT; ++i)
00043     {
00044         KactusAttribute::Firmness val = static_cast<KactusAttribute::Firmness>(i);
00045         firmnessCombo_->addItem(KactusAttribute::valueToString(val));
00046     }
00047     
00048     // Create the implementation label and value label (set to invisible by default).
00049     implementationLabel_ = new QLabel(tr("Implementation:"));
00050     implementationLabel_->setVisible(false);
00051 
00052     implementationValue_ = new QLabel(tr(""));
00053     implementationValue_->setVisible(false);
00054 
00055     QGridLayout* layout = new QGridLayout(this);
00056     layout->addWidget(prodHierLabel_, 0, 0, 1, 1);
00057     layout->addWidget(prodHierCombo_, 0, 1, 1, 1);
00058     layout->addWidget(firmnessLabel_, 1, 0, 1, 1);
00059     layout->addWidget(firmnessCombo_, 1, 1, 1, 1);
00060     layout->addWidget(implementationLabel_, 2, 0, 1, 1);
00061     layout->addWidget(implementationValue_, 2, 1, 1, 1);
00062     layout->setColumnStretch(2, 1);
00063 
00064     connect(prodHierCombo_, SIGNAL(currentIndexChanged(int)), this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()));
00065     connect(prodHierCombo_, SIGNAL(currentIndexChanged(int)), this, SIGNAL(productHierarchyChanged()));
00066     connect(firmnessCombo_, SIGNAL(currentIndexChanged(int)), this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()));
00067 }
00068

00071 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00072 KactusAttributeEditor::~KactusAttributeEditor()
00073 {
00074 }

00076 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00077 // Function: setAttributes()
00078 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00079 void KactusAttributeEditor::setAttributes(KactusAttribute::ProductHierarchy prodHier,
00080                                           KactusAttribute::Firmness firmness)
00081 {
00082     prodHierCombo_->setCurrentIndex(prodHier);
00083     firmnessCombo_->setCurrentIndex(firmness);
00084 }
00085 
00086 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00087 // Function: getProductHierarchy()
00088 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00089 KactusAttribute::ProductHierarchy KactusAttributeEditor::getProductHierarchy() const
00090 {
00091     return static_cast<KactusAttribute::ProductHierarchy>(prodHierCombo_->currentIndex());
00092 }
00093 
00094 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00095 // Function: getFirmness()
00096 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00097 KactusAttribute::Firmness KactusAttributeEditor::getFirmness() const
00098 {
00099     return static_cast<KactusAttribute::Firmness>(firmnessCombo_->currentIndex());
00100 }
00101 
00102 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00103 // Function: setImplementation()
00104 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00105 void KactusAttributeEditor::setImplementation(KactusAttribute::Implementation implementation)
00106 {
00107     implementationValue_->setText(KactusAttribute::valueToString(implementation));
00108     implementationLabel_->setVisible(true);
00109     implementationValue_->setVisible(true);
00110 }
00111 
00112 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00113 // Function: hideAttributes()
00114 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00115 void KactusAttributeEditor::hideAttributes()
00116 {
00117     prodHierLabel_->setVisible(false);
00118     prodHierCombo_->setVisible(false);
00119     firmnessLabel_->setVisible(false);
00120     firmnessCombo_->setVisible(false);
00121 }
